p: Besides its anti-inflammatory potential, Ocimum basilicum also presents other activity [ 60]. In a comprehensive review, Jadoon and co-workers discussed the anti-aging potential of several phyto-extracts from pharmaceutical products, where Ocimum basilicum was one of the selected botanicals due to its antioxidant properties. In addition, the same study reported a viscoelasticity of the facial skin, treated with an emulsion containing Ocimum basilicum ethanolic extract isolated from seeds [ 60]. Summarizing the literature data and the results obtained in this study, Ocimum basilicum L. could be considered a promising phytocompound for an anti-inflammatory, wound healing and anti-aging approach.
